amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for the salaries and expenses of the Marine Mammal Commission by $181,500 (6 percent).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds by $181,500 from the Marine Mammal Commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
